summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 31st Avenue West, from West Ray Street to a point 200 feet, more or less, north of West Armour Street; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with property owners' petition, being City Comptroller's File No. 179880, to the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
